title: The growth of League of Legends. This is just amazing!
body:
I just found this. LoL is growing too much!!!

http://i.imgur.com/MdNY1id.jpg

replies.body:
WHAOOOO


''Any player who has won 3 game on oceanic week will have their name on the statue''

Looks like its going to be :

xxdragonslyer
mid or feed
aatroxmain77
rektscrub45
swagmaster21

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pqonugkx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-23T11:27:02.301+0000)
>
> WHAOOOO
> 
> 
> ''Any player who has won 3 game on oceanic week will have their name on the statue''
> 
> Looks like its going to be :
> 
> xxdragonslyer
> mid or feed
> aatroxmain77
> rektscrub45
> swagmaster21

Wouldn't be surprised if this ends up also being a name sweep when they realize a large amount of the names to be engraved are racist or foul.

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pqonugkx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-23T11:33:22.344+0000)
>
> Wouldn't be surprised if this ends up also being a name sweep when they realize a large amount of the names to be engraved are racist or foul.

I hope that is what happens, because I am sure that I don't want to see f4gsl4yer or something on this. That being said, there would be limited space for engraving and that flushing offensive names out is a good way to converse it.

Especially given that it would probably be as high as 25ish% of names that are actually offensive in some manner, people really are terrible with their names, and it has been said they won't be put on, but it didn't sound like it would be "we are also getting rid of all said names"

I like how the picture cuts off to only read "Get's Deep" for the boards.

But yeah it's a newspaper who gives a %%%%, when it's on the news then maybe that would be awesome.

I can't understand people who read that trash. Can't people just bash their heads against concrete if they want to lose brain cells? Seriously, the drop in demand might save a few trees if people decided to read something worth reading for a change.

So the entire statue will be like
"XxSnipzaxX"
"Swag420"
"EzPezLel69"
"TriHerderScrub"
"Trolpoll420"
"Swaglyfe82"
"420Swagyola"
"ScrubPK69"

I still have no idea what the statue thing is.... is it like real life size irl or something or just a virtual web page statue?
oh its mx....they prob have nothing to write about anyway
